module.caption: USB Dual Role (Device and Host) MSC class examples with FreeRTOS (from ASF V1)
module.info: Using the USBB module and the deprecated USB software stack from ASF v1, USB Mass-Storage Class application that behaves as a USB Mass-Storage device(removable drive) in USB Device mode or operates in USB Reduced-Host mode when connected to a USB Mass-Storage device. Implementation with FreeRTOS.
